DOC.brief_summary: The study aim investigate effect strength train maximal strength , walk ability neural function chronic stroke patient . The strength training intervention study different previous intervention stroke patient . Maximal Strength Training ( MST ) involve weight 90 % participant 1 repetition maximum focus explosive development force . This study use principles unilateral leg press plantarflexion exercise . Only 2 previous study investigate high intensity strength train stroke patient use intensity 80 % 1RM . Previous MST intervention show large increase strength , rate force development transfer improved walking economy . The investigator predict MST give large increase strength , improve rate force development ( RFD ) walk economy . The investigator expect good neural function account improvement . This study could provide evidence adoption completely different method strength rehabilitation stroke survivor .
DOC.criteria: Under 67 year old Suffered stroke least 6 month previously Living Trondheim area travel cost cover 1500 NOK Must able walk , although use aid permit Participants must cognitive , visuospatial comprehension deficit magnitude interferes ability perform test training Participants must medically unstable ( e.g . uncontrollably high blood pressure ( 140/90 ) , arrythmia , heart instability know comorbid disease ) Participants must know pregnant
